Class TensorProduct

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.physics.quantum.TensorProduct
public class TensorProduct extends Object
Tensor product operations for multi-qubit systems.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Silvere Martin-Michiellot, Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)
